title: Plat border reverted back to gold
body: At the end of the season i got plat V. When preseason started i had a plat border. I just started a game and my plat border went back to a gold border.

replies.body:
Plat in Solo and Gold in Flex, that answers that.


Also, talk about BoOOOOOOOOOooooSTED, bronze Season 5, Gold Season 6, Plat Season 7.   Riot really needs to check those out more :)
Did you get Plat in Solo/Duo and Gold in Flex? Part of that might be why depending on the queue you're in.

> [{quoted}](name=Rester,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=n9AchseA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-15T02:21:00.636+0000)
>
> Did you get Plat in Solo/Duo and Gold in Flex? Part of that might be why depending on the queue you're in.

Oh okay i got plat in solo/duo and im playing flex rn
